/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and buildings, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the various colors of the buildings and vehicles. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the urban landscape of Beijing.
